title: Weight Management Package
description: A science-based approach to healthy weight loss and metabolic optimization. Combines targeted nutritional support, hormone and metabolic testing, and personalized nutrition coaching for sustainable results.

included.name: Metabolic Boost IV
included.description: Lipotropic compounds, B-complex vitamins, and amino acids to support fat metabolism and energy production

included.name: Metabolic & Hormone Panel
included.description: Comprehensive analysis of thyroid function, insulin resistance, cortisol, and key metabolic markers

included.name: Personalized Nutrition Consultation
included.description: One-on-one session with registered dietitian to create customized meal plan based on your blood results and goals
